edu.harvard.hul.ois.fits.tools

Interface Tool

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Runnable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ADLTool, AudioInfo, Droid, Exiftool, FFIdent, FileInfo, FileUtility, Jhove, MediaInfo, MetadataExtractor, TikaTool, ToolBase, VTTTool, XmlMetadata

    public interface Tool
extends Runnable
    All FITS tools implement this interface.

    • Method Detail

      • extractInfo

        ToolOutput extractInfo(File file)
                throws FitsToolException
        Extracts the identification and metadata from the provided file
        Parameters:
        file - the file to have its metadata extracted
        Returns:
        tooloutput object containing the xml wrapping the tool raw output, fits compatible xml output and the fits FileIdentity
        Throws:
        FitsToolException

      • isIdentityKnown

        boolean isIdentityKnown(ToolIdentity identity)
        Checks if the value for the given field name is the default value that the tool would report if it doesn't understand the file that was processed
        Parameters:
        identity - the identity to test
        Returns:
        boolean indicating the file is a known or unknown type for the tool
